content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Sarah Geronimo

}}
Sarah Geronimo is a Filipina singer, dancer, actress and record producer. She has received several awards and nominations for her work in music, film, and television. She has also won the Best Asian Artist at the Mnet Asian Music Awards in 2012, Best Southeast Asian Act at the MTV Europe Music Awards in 2014, Best Selling Filipino Artist at the 22nd World Music Awards, Best Asian Performer at Classic Rock Roll of Honour Awards in 2016, and the Global Force Award at Billboard Women in Music in 2024. She was inducted into the Anak TV Hall of Fame in 2013. Geronimo is a Goodwill Ambassador for Music of the National Commission for Culture and the Arts and a recipient of their Ani ng Dangal or "Harvest of Honors" state recognition for multi-disciplinary arts.
Aliw Awards
The Aliw Awards is an annual award-giving body in the Philippines that honors excellence in live entertainment. Established in 1976 by journalist Alice H. Reyes, it has recognized many of the country’s top performers. Sarah Geronimo, has won eight awards to date.

ASAP Pop Viewers' Choice Awards
The '''ASAP Pop Viewers' Choice Awards' is a fan-voted award show in the Philippines, presented annually by the musical variety show ASAP. It celebrates the most popular personalities, love teams, songs, movies, and TV moments as chosen by fans through various voting platforms.

Awit Awards
The Awit Awards is an annual award-giving body in the Philippines organized by the Philippine Association of the Record Industry (PARI) to recognize outstanding achievements in the local music industry. One of its most awarded artists is Sarah Geronimo, who has won 19 Awit Awards, including two Album of the Year honors for Perfectly Imperfect (2015) and The Great Unknown (2016), marking back-to-back wins in consecutive years.

Billboard Women in Music
Billboard Women in Music
The Billboard Women in Music is an annual event organized by Billboard that celebrates the most influential and inspiring women in the global music industry. In 2023, Sarah Geronimo was honored with the prestigious Global Force Award, becoming one of the six inaugural recipients of this new international category.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
!Year
!Award
!Result
!Host country
|-
|2024
|Global Force Award
|
||  United States
|}
Billboard Philippines Women in Music
Billboard Philippines Women in Music honors the most influential Filipina artists and industry leaders for their impact on OPM. In its inaugural 2024 edition, Sarah Geronimo became the first-ever recipient of the Woman of the Year Award, recognizing her two-decade career and lasting cultural influence.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
!Year
!Award
!Result
!Host country
|-
| 2024
| Woman of the Year
|
||  Philippines
|-
Box Office Entertainment Awards
The Box Office Entertainment Awards, presented annually by the Guillermo Mendoza Memorial Scholarship Foundation, recognizes the commercial success of Filipino artists and productions in film, television, and music. The awards primarily focus on box office performance and popularity rather than artistic merit. Sarah Geronimo is among the most awarded artists in the history of the ceremony. She notably received the titles of Box Office Queen, Female Recording Artist of the Year, and Concert Performer of the Year in a single night on two occasions, in 2009 and 2014, underscoring her widespread appeal and success across multiple entertainment fields.

Classic Rock Awards
The Classic Rock Awards celebrate excellence in rock music, honoring legendary artists, albums, and songs that have shaped the genre’s history and influence. In 2016, Sarah Geronimo became the only Filipino winner at the Classic Rock Awards for her powerful performance of Anak by Freddie Aguilar.

FAMAS Awards
The FAMAS Awards (Filipino Academy of Movie Arts and Sciences Awards) is one of the oldest and most prestigious film award-giving bodies in the Philippines. Sarah Geronimo has been nominated three times in the Best Actress category.

Golden Screen TV Awards
The Golden Screen TV Awards, presented by the Entertainment Press Society, honors outstanding achievements in Philippine television. Sarah Geronimo has been nominated three times for Best Performance by an Actress in a Lead Role (Musical/Comedy) for her role as Laida Magtalas in the A Very Special Love trilogy, winning the award once in 2013.
|-
|2009 || A Very Special Love ||  Best Performance by an Actress in a Lead Role (Musical or Comedy)  ||

|-
KBP Golden Dove Awards
The KBP Golden Dove Awards, presented by the Kapisanan ng mga Brodkaster ng Pilipinas (KBP), recognize excellence in Philippine radio and television broadcasting. The awards honor outstanding programs, personalities, and stations that demonstrate quality and professionalism. Sarah Geronimo's show, Sarah G Live won Best Variety Program, notably surpassing major Sunday shows like ASAP.
|-
| 2006 || Little Big Star || Best Variety Program ||
|-
| 2013 || Sarah G. Live || Best Variety Program ||
Mnet Asian Music Awards
The Mnet Asian Music Awards (MAMA) is a major annual music awards ceremony organized by South Korea’s CJ ENM through its music channel Mnet. It celebrates outstanding achievements in the Asian music industry, featuring top artists from across Asia and beyond. In 2012, Sarah Geronimo made history as one of the first Filipino artists to win a MAMA award, earning the Best Asian Artist (Philippines) title.
{| class="wikitable"
|-
!Year
!Award
!Result
!Host country
|-
|2012
|Best Asian Artist (Philippines)
|
||  Hong Kong
|}
MTV Awards
MTV Europe Music Awards
The MTV Europe Music Awards (EMAs) is a major international music awards show organized by MTV, celebrating the most popular and influential artists across Europe and worldwide. In 2014, Sarah Geronimo was the first Filipino artist to win an EMA, taking home the Best Southeast Asia Act award.

Myx Music Awards
The MYX Music Awards is an annual award show in the Philippines organized by the music channel MYX, celebrating the best in Filipino music and music videos. It is a fan-voted event honoring artists, songs, and videos across various genres. Sarah Geronimo is the most awarded artist in MYX history, with a total of 26 wins.

Nickelodeon Kid's Choice Awards
Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards
The '''Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards''' is an annual international awards show that celebrates the most popular entertainers, movies, TV shows, and music as voted by children and teenagers. In 2013, Sarah Geronimo was nominated for Favorite Asian Act but lost to Korean rapper Psy.

PMPC Star Awards for Movies
The PMPC Star Awards for Movies, presented by the Philippine Movie Press Club, recognizes outstanding achievements in the Philippine film industry. Sarah Geronimo won Movie Actress of the Year in 2019 for her performance in Miss Granny, after previously being nominated but not winning in 2016 for The Breakup Playlist.
|-

PPOP Music Awards
The PPOP Music Awards celebrate achievements in the Filipino pop (P-pop) music scene, recognizing the talents and contributions of artists, groups, and creators in this growing genre. In its 2023 edition, Sarah Geronimo was honored as the P-pop Icon of the Decade, acknowledging her significant influence and pioneering role in the development of Filipino pop music.
|-
| 2019 || Herself || Pop Music Icon of the Year ||
|-
| 2023 || Herself || Philippine Pop Icon of the Decade ||
|-
| 2025 || Umaaligid || Collaboration of the Year ||
|-
Spotify Wrapped
Spotify Wrapped: Top EQUAL Artist highlights the most streamed female artists featured in Spotify’s EQUAL campaign. In 2022, Sarah Geronimo was named a Top EQUAL Artist Philippines, recognizing her global impact and influence as a leading Filipina performer.
|-
| 2022 || Herself || Top EQUAL Philippines Artist ||
|-
Wish 107.5 Music Awards
The Wish 107.5 Music Awards honors outstanding Filipino music acts and performances, with a focus on live renditions featured on the popular Wish Bus and the top songs played on the station.
|-
| 2023 || Dati-Dati || Wish Pop Song of the Year ||
|-
WPVR Pinnacle Awards
The WPVR Pinnacle Awards is an annual music event by WPVR NY Platinum Vibes Radio that honors global talent across diverse music subgenres, including K-pop, J-pop, and P-pop. It celebrates outstanding achievements in international music.
|-
| 2022 || Dati-Dati || P-Pop Song of the Year ||
|-
World Music Awards
The World Music Awards is an international awards show that honors the best-selling and most popular recording artists from around the world, based on global sales data provided by the International Federation of the Phonographic Industry (IFPI). In 2014, Sarah Geronimo was nominated for World’s Best Female Artist, World’s Best Live Act, World’s Best Entertainer of the Year, winning World’s Best Philippine Act.
